Topic.Title: White citizens about to be screwed, big time?

Message.Msg: In lieu of the recent atrocities in Texas, where two prosecutors have been gunned down, allegedly by white supremacist groups, I find it difficult to believe that a financial message board run by Yahoo permits the following types of message to be posted. This particular message was posted under the alias of lewcor. As I’m sure you know, there are countless posts made every day by multiple aliased posters advocating racial intolerance and hatred by numerous bigoted lunatics. When posts go over the line, as this one has, both Yahoo and the appropriate authorities need to intervene. Posted by lewcor, on the AT&T Yahoo Finance message board, April 1st, at approximately 9:00 p.m. “Funny isn't (sic) how all the coloreds want to get into White nations. When there (sic) they start moaning about everythiong (sic) while living off of the welfare provided by Whites. I have one consolation. It's going to come to a screeching halt very soon. The real culprits in this mess will get their just desserts.” This is not the only post advocating violence by this poster and his other aliases. In the very next posts, he adds, “People are fools and deserve what's coming.” People following a stock message board have no need to be constantly threatened by ignorant bigots. Now that this is drawn to your attention, should this lunatic act upon his visions of “just desserts”, one would think some of the blame and liability would fall upon those who continued to let this poster make threats and encourage violence, or the authorities who failed to pay him a visit.

Message.Title: How many "green jobs" will $529 million buy?
Message.Msg: A case in point: o In 2009 the American people gave a $529 million loan guarantee to Fiscker Automotive o In 2009 Fiscker Automotive purchased a GM plant in Delaware for the purpose of making electric cars o In 2013 Fiscker Automotive furloughed 200 US workers o Fiscker Automotive has moved production to Finland and hired 500 workers there o To date Fiscker Automotive has produced 40 vehicles and delivered 2 Bottom line: $529 million can buy 500 "green jobs" in Finland. Thank you Mr. President for all that you do. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Message.Msg: "Do you ever get tired of posting this BS? You get called on it every time. At some point anyone with any self-respect would stop. Man, I think I would shoot myself if I was a cheap hack like you." Nice try, and very selective spin of the truth, but let's look at some facts: o "Fisker has hired Kirkland & Ellis, a major bankruptcy law firm, to review the company’s options while it continues to seek investment partners." o "The automaker has been working for months to raise $500 million so it could restart production of the Karma, its only model, which is built in Finland." o "A bankruptcy liquidation or restructuring could leave the government about $192 million in the hole. That’s what Fisker borrowed under the credit line before funding was shut off." Bottom line: The American people will probably lose about $192 million on its investment in a Finnish company that has provided 500 green jobs for Finland. Again, thank you Mr. President for all that you do. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Topic.Title: Stock buy-back will take T to 41-42, easily, in the next 6 months. PLUS the 5% divi. SWEET.

Message.Msg: A stock buy back at over twice the book value actually reduces the book value of the shares. That is one reason that book value is a poor indicator of the true value of a stock. The company income is distributed to fewer shares so the dividend should go up. The whole market should go up due to the reducing value of the dollar as they print more with no backing. $42 is very likely by the end of the year.
